How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: Welcome!
Hi there. Where should I go?
Hello! Welcome to the adventure! You are currently at the top-right corner of the map. Look to your left, do you see a small island? Let me know what you see there.
Yes with the giraffe?
No, you're not at the island with the giraffe just yet. Focus on the island to your left. Do you see a leopard resting there? Let me know what you see around the leopard.
I see pieces of coal

Great observation! You are on the right track. The correct path passes through the island just below the leopard. Now, carefully cross over to the island with the leopard. Let me know when you're there.
there
Well done! You successfully made it to the island with the leopard. Now, look around and tell me what animals you see on the larger island ahead of you, connected by a wooden twig.
a bird and elephant

Excellent! You have spotted the parrot and the elephant on the larger island. Here's what you need to do next: carefully cross over the head of the parrot and head down (south) between the parrot and the elephant. Let me know when you've done that!
there

Fantastic! You've successfully passed between the parrot and the elephant. Now, continue your journey south-east. You'll encounter three rocks - two gray ones and a darker one. Cross over them and reach the next island. Let me know when you've reached the island with the frog on it.
there

Great job! You made it to the island with the frog. Now, start heading south, below the frog. Keep going until you reach the end of the island, then make a u-turn to the left (west). Let me know when you've completed the u-turn!
there
Awesome! You have completed the u-turn to the left (west). Now, head back to the island with the parrot and the elephant, this time going left (west). Let me know when you have arrived at the island.
there

Perfect! You're back at the island with the parrot and the elephant. Well done! Now, look around and find two gray rocks. Cross over those rocks and head towards the island on the left side of the map where you'll find a giraffe. Let me know when you've reached the island with the giraffe!
there

Fantastic! You have reached the island with the giraffe. Well done! Now, here's what you need to do next: go below (southwest) the giraffe, then make a 90-degree turn to the left (southeast). Cross to another island where you'll find a snake. Let me know when you've arrived at the island with the snake!
i cant see anything to the left of the giraffe

Apologies for the confusion. Let's reassess the situation. From the island with the giraffe, go to the right (east) instead of left (southeast). Cross over to another island. On this island, you'll find a snake. Let me know when you've arrived there.
there

Apologies for the confusion earlier! Well done on reaching the island with the snake. Now, carefully make your way over the snake and continue forward. You are very close to your final destination. Let me know once you have reached the treasure!

chat.msg: Welcome!
hi there
Hello! Are you ready to navigate the map and follow the path?
yes
Great! Let's start. Look to your left and tell me what you see there.
a stand
Good. Now, walk towards the stand and cross the stream in front of it. Let me know when you've done that.
there
Alright! Now, turn left and cross the stream again. What do you see in front of you?
a doe
That's close! But we're not quite there yet. Instead, look around for a wooden branch that crosses the river. Can you see it?
yes
Perfect! Cross over the wooden branch and head south. What do you see next to the branch?

chat.msg: Welcome!
hi there. where do i go?
Hello! You're at the opening of a tent. To start, take a few steps south and follow the trail. Let me know what you see along the way!
a human
Great! You've encountered a person. Keep going on the trail to the east. Keep me updated on what you see!
a car
Almost there! You've reached a car. Instead of touching the car, make a right u-turn and head back west to where the road forks. Let me know what you come across!
a telescope
Excellent! You've found a telescope. Veer right and take an off-trail shortcut around the telescope until you return to the trail. Keep me posted on your progress!
i see a house
Great job! You've made it to the wooden cabin. That's our final objective. Well done!
